channel.title: RWT sites
channel.description:
These sites are all based over in China or India.. Has anyone else noticed they all say the same thing when you ask for help, or they all lie to you.. I got lied to 4 times today when I asked how much they got on my account now..
These people are like telling you lies, and then you set them straight and they find an excuse..
They all said the "worker" is offline and will be back in a hour or so. Then they said it will take 10-12 hours to be updated so come back then, when thats exactly what it says on their order tracker..
They are so lame. Their lucky it's not my money on the paypal or I would be raging hard on them.
What about your guy's experience with them?

item.title: RWT sites
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:25, topic:375284”][quote author=Explisionist link=topic=471239.msg3449975#msg3449975 date=1293675463]

[quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=471239.msg3449803#msg3449803 date=1293668142]

They lie because they don’t know what the fuck there doing, and there all asian and foreign because if anyone dare to start one in the uk or usa they’d be sued in a heartbeat, i think china or some shit has some laws protecting them from jagex.

I think its because they are communist, that they are mainly not affected by the laws.

Not to mention its selling stuff to people in a game, so the laws don’t matter, they can only get them for copy right infrigment same with botting. Its not like a lawyer is gonna come to your house and say “Your being sued for buying money on Runescape” So luckily the most you can get is ban from the game.
[/quote]Well gold4rs is fairly large, probably the most used cheating site. If they operated in a country such as the uk or usa, they can and would be sued, just like what happened to the old operator of rsbots “quarters” was tracked down and fined 1000$ and had to agree to never play or reverse engineer runescape again.

The moral of that is anything that goes against Jagex’s terms is against the law and can be enforced, even if it is as silly as selling gold…

Actually no, they got Rsbot with copy right infringement… Who ever told you that crap story lied to you.

The only way you can be sued is if your causing harm to the game, but it seems like selling stuff in a game for RWC is not a crime under any law nor is it punishable by the government.
If it was a lot of people would be getting sued.
[/quote]Well if they can prove the services they’re offering is causing some sort of loss of income.[/quote]
Still they can’t the only thing you pay for on Runscape is membership. So either way you cannot be sued.

Read full topic

If it was a lot of people would be getting sued.[/quote]Well if they can prove the services they’re offering is causing some sort of loss of income.

item.title: RWT sites
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

EMINEM BEAST™:

How do they transfer money and valuable items to the accounts if theres a trade limit?

There is a way of transferring money via GE if you know what your doing. Alot of the time though, when you order something, they will bot your account until it has the cash to obtain the item, or has the amount you purchased.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I never had a problem when there was not a trade limit. That was the only time I actually bought money. (20m) And I got within 10 minutes. It was from a random site though. But I have sold many rs accs to gold4rs and they have paid me for every1 so idk.

item.title: RWT sites
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

Eh, I bought bandos godsword like a year ago from them, all went good until I met a worker of theres, not a actual worker, but a person on the forums who helps out I guess you can say.

I talked to him, he told me talk to him on MSN if I needed anything, hour later after adding him he randomly asked if I can give him a visa gift card to unlimit his account since it was limited, I told him no several times (also took pictures.), and he threaten to delay/stop my order, which at the time I don’t know if he can or can not, contacted an Administrator and it all got sorted out and I believe she made my order quicker, first day of them doing my order they got around a few million, maximum, the following day the order was completed, but anyways, the guy was demoted by the Administrator, he begged for administrator status for a few minutes and ended up banning me and some other guy, and he ended up getting perm banned, and me and the guy who was banned was unbanned, don’t even know why the person made him an administrator afterwards, but oh well.

Some guy named ‘Tmobile’, I believe hes still banned;o Took some time to explain to Lily (a worker, she ended up actually banning him);x

Never used there service afterwards.

Read full topic

item.title: RWT sites
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Don’t log in your account in the future, because eventually you will get banned.

Gamers often use different IP’S and you don’t want to have your account linked from different places. I can tell you this first hand.

Read full topic

item.title: RWT sites
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:6, topic:375284”]USFINE, never had a problem.

I worked for them and had nearly 300m bought with rares on my account.

They have a feature that you can track your order, I believe it’s updated every few hours(accurate as well)
You can add my MSN as I can directly contact a manger for up-to-date information with USFINE.

Also, they aren’t GOLD4RS :P[/quote]
I know lol (: But yeah usfine was good for keeping an eye on the order… But the people when you asked for information never told me the truth… only Rose did… And she barely could get an answer for me… Gold4rs has been working on my fire cape and tassets for 3 days now… And only got 2m for the tassets so far… And hasn’t started on the fire cape… I was pretty mad when I logged in and seen that… So I made them get the fire cape first and tassets last… Since it was $26.99 for both it was a free fire cape… Thats why I chose them

Read full topic

item.title: RWT sites
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

actually, there not scamming you, they just have an horrible understanding of english etc, and they are horribly organized, they dont even use those live support names, so the person your talking to on live support doesn’t know who your talking about, so they just come up with an excuse “He/She will be back soon”
this is an example of gold4rs.com, they are just horrible with english and badly organized, but really they are legit.

Read full topic
